response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the carton of orange juice inside the refrigerator. The next step is to close the refrigerator.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the carton of orange juice.
(2) Grasp the carton of orange juice.
(3) Move the robot to the refrigerator.
(4) Open the refrigerator.
(5) Put the carton of orange juice inside the refrigerator.
(6) Close the refrigerator.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 6: Close the refrigerator
    fridge_xyejdx_0 = registry(env,"fridge_xyejdx_0")
    close(robot, fridge_xyejdx_0)
    donothing(env)
